item.description:
Purgatory Chasm State Reservation

I had so much fun the last meet up I planned there and hope to get more people to come this time. We will meet by the sitting place you will see all the other people with cameras standing around. we can all walk around and take pictures of what ever you want or you can model for everyone as well. It is up to you. Here is a link to the park and it is free to get in.

http://www.mass.gov/d...

I hope to see you there,
Jenn
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot near the bathrooms and benches
item.name: Purgatory Chasm State Reservation
